item.title: The Sanya EDITION is preparing for Chinese New Year 2020
item.description: Source: The Sanya EDITION. In anticipation of the Chinese New Year, The Sanya EDITION presents two unique offerings that provide a genuine experience of Chinese culture. Guests can immerse themselves in culture and history through The Sanya EDITION’s collaboration with the Forbidden City. This partnership features a temporary shop and exhibit highlighting fine arts and teas. Those with a passion for cuisine will enjoy the luxurious interpretations of Chinese dishes prepared by world-renowned Michelin-starred chefs, specially invited by The Sanya EDITION for the celebratory period.
